AI at the Edge. An Invulnerable Privacy Solution.

Aerendir Mobile Inc. is the pioneer developer of a novel physiologic, biometric
authentication technology.

LEARN MORE

Our Unique Technology

AI

Aerendir developed an Artificial
Intelligence (AI) technology that gives learning
capabilities to the Edge of the Edge.
It can provide High-End generic AI
to Low-End chips.

Anti bot

Our technology can feel
if a human touches
a device with 80-90% accuracy.

Cloudless

No data will be stored, exchanged
or even computed on the Internet
protecting users against hacking
and data breaches.

Biometrics

The NeuroPrint extracts a unique
proprioceptive signal from
micro-vibrational patterns from user’s
hands to identify and authenticate.

Totally Unique

Aerendr offers technologies ready to be embedded as a tailor-made solution for B2B for authentication, identification and encryption. Aerendir’s technology and product application are not only unique, our NeuroPrintTM is one of the most disruptive technologies in today’s market. It does not require costly hardware, and can be applied whenever and wherever one needs to be either recognized or authenticated.

Unhackable

It allows for a strong self-encryption, as we could say that our brain generates a stable and unique password that is close to 1 million characters long. Needless to say that such complexity will never be cracked by brute force with ANY of the existing technologies.

Unspoofable
